item.title: RBI hikes benchmark lending rate by 35 basis points to tame inflation
item.description: RBI hikes benchmark lending rate by 35 basis points to tame inflation This is the fifth consecutive rate hike after a 40 basis points increase in May and 50 basis points hike each in June, August and September
